image.name: inputImageFile
image.label: Input Image
image.description: Input image in which to count and classify positive pixels

region.name: analysis_roi
region.label: Analysis ROI
region.description: Region of interest within which the analysis should be done. Must be a four element vector in the format "left, top, width, height" in the space of the base layer. Default value of "-1, -1, -1, -1" indicates that the whole image should be processed.

string.name: server
string.label: MONAILabel Address
string.description: Address of a monailabel address in the format 'http://127.0.0.1:8000/'.

string.name: model_name
string.label: Model Name
string.description: DeepLearning Model to Infer (For Example: deepedit_nuclei, segmentation_nuclei)

float.name: min_poly_area
float.label: Min Polygon Area
float.description: Filter Polygons based on min area size

string.name: extra_params
string.label: Extra Params (JSON)
string.description: Extra/Other Config Parameters defined by MONAILabel inference task

integer.name: max_workers
integer.label: Number of workers
integer.description: Number of workers that shall be used by MONAILabel server to run inference on wsi patches. Use zero to allow server to decide based on number of cpus.
